Events.RelatedDescription: Opened issue "How to build the open xml?" (#522) at OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody:
Hi
For one of my projects I want to embedd the open xml into one of my dlls . I started downloading master Open xml from below address: https://github.com/OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK And tried to build it first, but to my dismay its saying The SDK 'Microsoft.NET.Sdk' specified could not be found

I have looked at below address and I saw I have installed these .net cores: C:\Program Files\dotnet\sdk

1.0.0, 1.1.9, 1.1.10, 2.0.2, 2.1.2, 2.1.201, 2.1.202, 2.1.400, 2.1.401

In the cs project its written netstandard1.3 is needed. But I can not find this package on microsoft website.

Do you know how I can build OpenXml?

Events.RelatedDescription: Merged pull request "Simplify schema attributes and consolidate definitions" (#496) at OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody:
This creates a readonly struct that abstracts the attribute definitions
and management to help with readability and cleaner code.

Before:

```
BenchmarkDotNet=v0.10.14, OS=Windows 10.0.14393.2155 (1607/AnniversaryUpdate/Redstone1), VM=Hyper-V
Intel Xeon CPU E5-2673 v4 2.30GHz, 1 CPU, 2 logical and 2 physical cores
  [Host] : .NET Framework 4.7.1 (CLR 4.0.30319.42000), 64bit RyuJIT-v4.7.2558.0
  net46  : .NET Framework 4.7.1 (CLR 4.0.30319.42000), 64bit RyuJIT-v4.7.2558.0

Job=net46  Runtime=Clr  

|      Method|      Mean|     Error|    StdDev|      Gen 0|     Gen 1|     Gen 2|  Allocated
|  Validation|  79.86 ms|  1.519 ms|  1.560 ms|  2437.5000|  687.5000|  312.5000|   13.86 MB
```

After:

```
BenchmarkDotNet=v0.10.14, OS=Windows 10.0.14393.2155 (1607/AnniversaryUpdate/Redstone1), VM=Hyper-V
Intel Xeon CPU E5-2673 v4 2.30GHz, 1 CPU, 2 logical and 2 physical cores
  [Host] : .NET Framework 4.7.1 (CLR 4.0.30319.42000), 64bit RyuJIT-v4.7.2558.0
  net46  : .NET Framework 4.7.1 (CLR 4.0.30319.42000), 64bit RyuJIT-v4.7.2558.0

Job=net46  Runtime=Clr  

|      Method|      Mean|     Error|    StdDev|      Gen 0|     Gen 1|     Gen 2|  Allocated
|  Validation|  80.01 ms|  1.535 ms|  1.198 ms|  2500.0000|  687.5000|  187.5000|   13.91 MB
```

There is a large reduction of Gen2 allocations, while everything else remains similar. This change reduces the code to handle attributes from 60k LOC to 30k, reduces 3 virtual methods to a single one per schema, and reduces the static arrays per schema from 2 to 1.  A future request will attempt to bring a similar system to the element definitions/creation.

Events.RelatedDescription: Opened issue "Document with justified and left aligned text is incorrectly formatted when converting to html" (#243) at OfficeDev/Open-Xml-PowerTools
Events.RelatedBody:
Minimum markup for which conversation fails:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
<w:document xmlns:wpc="http://schemas.microsoft.com/office/word/2010/wordprocessingCanvas" 
    xmlns:cx="http://schemas.microsoft.com/office/drawing/2014/chartex"

    xmlns:cx4="http://schemas.microsoft.com/office/drawing/2016/5/10/chartex" 
    xmlns:cx5="http://schemas.microsoft.com/office/drawing/2016/5/11/chartex" 
    xmlns:cx6="http://schemas.microsoft.com/office/drawing/2016/5/12/chartex" 
    xmlns:cx7="http://schemas.microsoft.com/office/drawing/2016/5/13/chartex" 
    xmlns:cx8="http://schemas.microsoft.com/office/drawing/2016/5/14/chartex" 
    xmlns:mc="http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/markup-compatibility/2006" 
    xmlns:aink="http://schemas.microsoft.com/office/drawing/2016/ink" 
    xmlns:am3d="http://schemas.microsoft.com/office/drawing/2017/model3d" 
    xmlns:o="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:office" 
    xmlns:r="http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/officeDocument/2006/relationships" 
    xmlns:m="http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/officeDocument/2006/math" 
    xmlns:v="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:vml" 
    xmlns:wp14="http://schemas.microsoft.com/office/word/2010/wordprocessingDrawing" 
    xmlns:wp="http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/drawingml/2006/wordprocessingDrawing" 
    xmlns:w10="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:word" 
    xmlns:w="http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/wordprocessingml/2006/main" 
    xmlns:w14="http://schemas.microsoft.com/office/word/2010/wordml" 
    xmlns:w15="http://schemas.microsoft.com/office/word/2012/wordml" 
    xmlns:w16cid="http://schemas.microsoft.com/office/word/2016/wordml/cid" 
    xmlns:w16se="http://schemas.microsoft.com/office/word/2015/wordml/symex" 
    xmlns:wpg="http://schemas.microsoft.com/office/word/2010/wordprocessingGroup" 
    xmlns:wpi="http://schemas.microsoft.com/office/word/2010/wordprocessingInk" 
    xmlns:wne="http://schemas.microsoft.com/office/word/2006/wordml" 
    xmlns:wps="http://schemas.microsoft.com/office/word/2010/wordprocessingShape" mc:Ignorable="w14 w15 w16se w16cid wp14">
    <w:body>
        <w:p w14:paraId="4F76327E" w14:textId="07E7AA7B" w:rsidR="007145F2" w:rsidRDefault="0013176D" w:rsidP="0073348A">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:ind w:left="-570"/>
                <w:jc w:val="both"/>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:rFonts w:ascii="Arial" w:hAnsi="Arial"/>
                    <w:color w:val="222222"/>
                    <w:shd w:val="clear" w:color="auto" w:fill="FFFFFF"/>
                    <w:lang w:val="nl-BE" w:eastAsia="nl-BE" w:bidi="nl-BE"/>
                </w:rPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:lang w:val="fr-FR" w:eastAsia="fr-FR" w:bidi="fr-FR"/>
                </w:rPr>
                <w:t>Police</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:r>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:rFonts w:ascii="Arial" w:hAnsi="Arial"/>
                    <w:color w:val="222222"/>
                    <w:shd w:val="clear" w:color="auto" w:fill="FFFFFF"/>
                    <w:lang w:val="nl-BE" w:eastAsia="nl-BE" w:bidi="nl-BE"/>
                </w:rPr>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve"></w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w14:paraId="60D946B7" w14:textId="1C4DE7A7" w:rsidR="0073348A" w:rsidRPr="0073348A" w:rsidRDefault="0073348A" w:rsidP="005119DD">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:ind w:hanging="570"/>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:lang w:val="fr-FR"/>
                </w:rPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:proofErr w:type="spellStart"/>
            <w:proofErr w:type="gramStart"/>
            <w:r>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:rFonts w:ascii="Arial" w:hAnsi="Arial"/>
                    <w:color w:val="222222"/>
                    <w:shd w:val="clear" w:color="auto" w:fill="FFFFFF"/>
                    <w:lang w:val="nl-BE" w:eastAsia="nl-BE" w:bidi="nl-BE"/>
                </w:rPr>
                <w:t>ggg</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:bookmarkStart w:id="0" w:name="_GoBack"/>
            <w:bookmarkEnd w:id="0"/>
            <w:proofErr w:type="spellEnd"/>
            <w:proofErr w:type="gramEnd"/>
        </w:p>
        <w:sectPr w:rsidR="0073348A" w:rsidRPr="0073348A">
            <w:pgSz w:w="12240" w:h="15840"/>
            <w:pgMar w:top="1440" w:right="1440" w:bottom="1440" w:left="1440" w:header="708" w:footer="708" w:gutter="0"/>
            <w:cols w:space="708"/>
            <w:docGrid w:linePitch="360"/>
        </w:sectPr>
    </w:body>
</w:document>

Events.RelatedDescription: Merged pull request "Add support for .Net Core" (#238) at OfficeDev/Open-Xml-PowerTools
